meaning_str.bing:
v. 成功；接替；继承；继任
网络. 取得成功；继续；继…之后

成功；达成；（学业、事业或其他活动）表现出色；有作为；取得预期效果；继任；接任；接替；随后出现；结果却是…

1.en: When you see a smile on child's face, you know you have done the right thing and in some small way, contributing to help them succeed.
1.cn: 当你看到孩子们脸上的笑容，你知道你做了正确的事情，并在细微之处帮助他们的未来。

2.en: Then he took his firstborn son, who was to succeed him as king, and offered him as a sacrifice on the city wall.
2.cn: 便将那应当接续他作王的长子，在城上献为燔祭。

3.en: Bush may be right that Americans will not long support policies that don't involve trying to succeed.
3.cn: 布什认为美国人不会长久支持不尝试取胜的政策，他可能是对的。

0.en: So the simple truth is, when women succeed, America succeeds.
0.cn: 因此，简单的事实就是，妇女成功了，美国就成功了。

2.en: What if we put Milkin in a position to succeed. Now, I don't care if Milkin actually succeeds.
2.cn: 如果我们让米尔金有机会取得成功呢？我并不在乎米尔金是不是真能成功。

3.en: I like to back people who want to succeed. Take yourself as an example.
3.cn: 我愿意支持渴望成功的人，你自己就是个例子。

4.en: He's smart, he's a marketing genius and he'll do whatever it takes to succeed.
4.cn: 他聪明，他是市场营销天才，他知道怎么才能走向成功

5.en: I only succeed with you guys if I get my teaching across as effectively as he did.
5.cn: 如果我像他一样有效地对你们进行教学，才算是成功了。

6.en: When our veterans have the opportunity to succeed, our whole nation is stronger.
6.cn: 当我们的退伍军人拥有了成功的机会，我们整个国家会变得更加强大。

7.en: Oh, I don't know, I mean, let's say we succeed in proving that our consciousness creates reality.
7.cn: 我说不好，就算我们成功证明了我们的意识创造现实。

8.en: To succeed, we must embrace all our realities, especially the harsh realities that we wish weren't true.
8.cn: 要成功就得拥抱所有的现实，特别是难以接受的严酷现实。

9.en: Well, I reckon you work hard and you deserve to succeed. You just have to stick at it and you will.
9.cn: 我倒觉得，你很努力，应该获得成功只要你继续坚持，你不能放弃。

10.en: And in 1984, I launched my own television show with a relentless determination to succeed.
10.cn: 在1984年，我推出了自己的电视栏目，而这靠的是自己追求成功的坚定决心。

11.en: I have no doubt you will succeed in that as well. But you will do so without the support you are about to ask of me.
11.cn: 你最后会成功，我深信不疑，即使不向我寻求帮助，你也能如愿。

12.en: If we succeed, let it be for all of Panem and let it be forever. Yes, you already made history.
12.cn: 如果我们成功了，施惠国会永获自由，我们的起义也会永垂不朽，是的，你们已经创造了历史。

13.en: You can listen to this naysayer, but I promise you this; if we succeed all will share in the wealth of the mountain.
13.cn: 你们可以听他劝阻，不过，我保证如果成功，孤山的财富大家可以一起分享。

14.en: Kevin, I've known you your whole life. Well, except for those two minutes at the beginning. You've succeed at everything you've ever tried.
14.cn: 凯文，我都认识你一辈子了，除了最初的两分钟。你努力的每件事都成功了。

15.en: And I succeed. I perform my first surprise, illegal high wire walk. This is also the first time I get the taste of this sensation.
15.cn: 结果成功了，我进行了第一次出人意料的非法高空走钢索，我也第一次尝到那种兴奋的滋味。

16.en: Francis, I could be impeached if I do that. No, no. Look, Davis and Usher, they're in a position to protect you. They want you to succeed.
16.cn: 弗兰西斯，如果我这么做会被弹劾。不会的，戴维斯和厄舍，他们可以保护你。他们希望你成功。

17.en: At the same time, it didn't stop me from aggressively going after the things I wanted. To succeed, I needed to see more than I alone could see. But standing in my way of doing that were the two biggest barriers everyone faces. Our ego and blind spot barriers.
17.cn: 同时它也没有阻止我奋发追寻想要的东西。我得看到比一己之力更多的东西才能成功。但我成功路上的障碍也是每个人面对的两个最大障碍，即自负和盲点。

18.en: When the city became a republic in 1965, few thought a country with so few resources and of vastly different ethnic groups could succeed.
18.cn: 新加坡于 1965 年宣布独立，当时有些人认为这个国家缺乏天然资源，又融合太多民族，难以获得成功。

19.en: But succeed it has, on an unimaginable scale!
19.cn: 但事实证明，新加坡获得了空前的成就！
